alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern New Hanover and east central Brunswick Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Boiling Springs Lake, moving east at 5 mph. This storm will produce very heavy rain and lightning. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carolina Beach, Kure Beach, Snows Cut, South Masonboro Island, North Masonboro Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, Mill Creek, Myrtle Grove, Sea Breeze, Silver Lake, Masonboro and Bolivia. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 31 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
